enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
sentences: On capacity building for developing countries (FCCC/SBI/2007/25 and MISC.8), CHINA criticized the focus on routine monitoring. AOSIS underlined capacity for monitoring and evaluation.
PAKISTAN called for investment in education and science and technology.
Helmut Hojesky (Austria) and Crispin d'Auvergne (St.Lucia) will convene a contact group.
On capacity building for economies in transition (FCCC/SBI/2007/18 and MISC.9), the EU acknowledged challenges for EITs as they prepare for the first commitment period.
Vlad Trusca (Romania) and Helmut Hojesky (Austria) will convene informal consultations.
